page.title: 16Llandegai School
page.content: Llandegai School is an area primary school. It has taken over three schools, they are Aber School, Glas Infryn and Tal_y_Bont. Llandegai is situated in a peaceful area. The school is in the middle of Llandegai village. Llandegai School is made out of stone and the roof is slate. It was first built in 1957. There is also a separate building which used to be the old school and was built in 1696. It is now used as a youth club. Mr.Jones is the headmaster of Llandegai School. There are a hundred and thirty nine pupils and six teachers including the headmaster. The children do not wear uniform because Mr.Jones does not believe in it.
